name: Try
description:
Hello my friend! Please try to win! Look that your player will start in same position of yours adversaries. If you lose, try try again! If you don't try you're a loser. Ahh please don't complain the game is unfair because you'll start in same conditions, if you lose is because you don't strive.

To start the game using SPACE BAR or ENTER. Using arrows to control your black ball in right screen.

#AntifaGameJam 2018
